definition: government/official (approved or issued by an authority)

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: What publications will be published during the Guangzhou Asian Games?
sentences.chinese: 广州亚运会赛时官方出版物计划有哪些？

sentences.english: Officials say new information led to the remains at what is believed to be the crash site.
sentences.chinese: 官方人员称新信息领导着剩余的被认为在撞碎的地方。

sentences.english: Mr Tait also acted as the official photographer.
sentences.chinese: 泰特先生还担当了官方摄影师的职责。

sentences.english: Stars become the official page, the stars become the novel to read.
sentences.chinese: 星辰变官方页面，星辰变小说阅读。

sentences.english: Also Massimo Moratti has announced officially his new coach.
sentences.chinese: 莫拉蒂亲自官方宣布了他的新教练。

sentences.english: In Malaysia, officials have warned Muslims against celebrating.
sentences.chinese: 在马拉西亚，官方已经警告过穆斯林要反对庆祝了。

sentences.english: The official death toll has also risen, to 110, 000 people.
sentences.chinese: 官方报道的死亡人口数字也已经上升到11万。

sentences.english: If there is any discrepancy, the English version is the official version.
sentences.chinese: 如果有任何差异，请以官方的英文版本作准。

sentences.english: What Beijing will do about the unofficial financial system is anyone's guess at this point.
sentences.chinese: 北京如何处理这些非官方债务，任谁都猜得到。

sentences.english: English is the official language, but Cantonese and Malay are also spoken.
sentences.chinese: 官方语言为英语，粤语和马来语同样通行。

sentences.english: The official mobile game of DreamWorks Animations' How To Train Your Dragon.
sentences.chinese: 梦工厂动画制作的官方手机游戏“驯龙高手”。

sentences.english: Even the state-run media and tennis officials appear to concede the point.
sentences.chinese: 甚至官方媒体和中国网管中心也承认了之一点。

sentences.english: But the OECD figure is quite different to the official Chinese figures.
sentences.chinese: 但是经合组织的数字与中国官方的统计数据迥异。

sentences.english: Just 65 tickets are available for the official tour package backed by the Japan Football Association.
sentences.chinese: 日本足球协会组织的官方旅游团只有65张球票。

sentences.english: Microsoft did not offer an official comment.
sentences.chinese: 微软没有发布官方消息。

sentences.english: An asterism is a star formation that is not an officially recognized constellation.
sentences.chinese: 这个三星符号是没有被官方确认的星座。

definition: official website (abbr. for 官方網站|官方网站[guan1 fang1 wang3 zhan4])
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
foreign news media/abbr. of 外國媒體|外国媒体
to release/to issue/to announce/to distribute/also written 發布|发布[fa1 bu4]
